scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run livereload & npm run connect
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run mustache' src/views & watchify src/js/index.js -o public/app.js -v & npm run sass -- -w src/sass
scripts.build:dev: npm run browserify & npm run sass & npm run mustache
scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run minify && npm run mini:add
scripts.minify: uglifyjs public/app.js -o public/app.min.js & minify public/app.css -o public/app.min.css
scripts.mustache: find src/views/partials -name '*.mustache' | xargs -I {} echo '-p' {} ' ' | xargs -I {} sh -c 'eval mustache {} package.json src/views/index.mustache > public/index.html'
scripts.preview:push: npm version minor && npm run preview:mkdir && npm run preview:scp && npm run preview:open
scripts.preview:push:patch: npm version patch && npm run preview:mkdir && npm run preview:scp && npm run preview:open
